title: Assorted chocolate sweets
ingredients: ['500g dark chocolate with 72% cocoa content', '520g dark cooking chocolate', '50g shortbread, crumbled', '40g praline', '300g creme fraiche', '1 tablespoon rum', '50g desiccated coconut', '1 vanilla bean', '30g unsweetened cocoa powder', '150g corn flakes or rice pops', '50g white chocolate (optional)', 'candied orange peel', 'caramel, milk jam or lemon curd', 'pistachio, walnuts, almonds, raisins']
